title: Fall Favorites, Date Ideas, & Halloween Costumes!
itunes:title: Fall Favorites, Date Ideas, & Halloween Costumes!
description:
In this week’s episode, Kimberly Cobb is joined by a special guest... her best friend, Danielle (@danidutch)! The gals discuss their fall 2022 favorites, play a game of "yay or nay" about fall date ideas, share what they're dressing up as for Halloween this year, & more!

Follow for weekly episodes of the "My Lips Aren't Sealed" podcast, where I discuss dating, fashion, entertainment, travel, pop culture, and more from my life. Thanks for listening!

 

DOWNLOAD THE REGALIA APP:

Link - https://admin.allregalia.com/referral?ref=kimberlycobb

Use referral code KIMBERLYCOBB

 

MICROBLADING: 

Location - Swamp Mermaid Beauty Project in Austin, Texas

Use discount code KIMBERLY20 for 20% off brows, lip blushing, or salon services!

 

DONATE:

Venmo: https://account.venmo.com/u/Kimberly-Cobb
